meanings.definition: A person who works on a farm, especially as a laborer.
meanings.sent1: The farmhands harvested the crops under the hot sun.
meanings.sent2: The farmhands fed the animals every morning.
meanings.sent3: The farmhands tried to milk the chickens, thinking they were cows!
meanings.sent4: The farmhands were the backbone of the agricultural operation.
meanings.sent5: The farmhands toiled tirelessly in the fields from dawn till dusk.

meanings.sent1: Many farmhands were needed to plant the seeds in the vast fields.
meanings.sent2: The farmhands greeted the sunrise with their daily tasks.
meanings.sent3: The farmhands organized a dance party in the barn.
meanings.sent4: The farmhands stood united, ready to face any challenge.
meanings.sent5: The farmhands' laughter echoed across the farm as they worked together.
